turkish_example_sentence: Siz müzayedede nadir eski kitapları bulacaktınız ama geç kaldınız.
english_example_sentence: You were going to find rare old books at the auction but you were late.
russian_example_sentence: Вы собирались найти редкие старые книги на аукционе, но опоздали.
